Zend_Gdata  
Exif  
No 
No 

Description

An Atom entry containing EXIF metadata.

Methods

__construct, getDOM, getTags, setTags, takeChildFromDOM,

__construct( DOMElement   $element = null, ) : n/a

Description

Create a new instance.

Arguments

Name Type Description Default
$element DOMElement | (optional) DOMElement from which this object should be constructed. null

Return value

Type Description
n/a n/a

getDOM( DOMDocument   $doc = null,   $majorVersion = 1,   $minorVersion = null, ) : DOMElement

Description

Retrieves a DOMElement which corresponds to this element and all child properties. This is used to build an entry back into a DOM and eventually XML text for sending to the server upon updates, or for application storage/persistence.

Arguments

Name Type Description Default
$doc DOMDocument | The DOMDocument used to construct DOMElements null
$majorVersion n/a 1
$minorVersion n/a null

Return value

Type Description
DOMElement The DOMElement representing this element and all child properties.

getTags( ) : Zend_Gdata_Exif_Extension_Tags

Description

Retrieve the tags for this entry.

Return value

Type Description
Zend_Gdata_Exif_Extension_Tags The requested object or null if not set.

Tags

Name Description
see setTags

setTags( Zend_Gdata_Exif_Extension_Tags   $value, ) : Zend_Gdata_Exif_Entry

Description

Set the tags property for this entry. This property contains various Exif data.

This corresponds to the property in the Google Data protocol.


Arguments

Name Type Description Default
$value Zend_Gdata_Exif_Extension_Tags | The desired value this element, or null to unset.

Return value

Type Description
Zend_Gdata_Exif_Entry Provides a fluent interface

takeChildFromDOM( DOMNode   $child, ) : n/a

Description

Creates individual Entry objects of the appropriate type and stores them as members of this entry based upon DOM data.

Arguments

Name Type Description Default
$child DOMNode | The DOMNode to process

Return value

Type Description
n/a n/a
